Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Phira he bahike ho'e ate jhuthala'una vali'o
zakuma (thora) de rukha kha'uge
Phira usa nala apana peta bharoge
Phira usa tom ba'ada ubalada pani pi'uge
Phira tiha'e utha di tarham pi'unge
Iha unham di inasafa de dina mahimana nivazi hovegi
Asim tuhanu paida kita hai phira tusim pusati ki'um nahim karade
ki tusim usa ciza (viraza) bare vicara kita jihara tusim (auratam ve garabha vica) tapaka'unde ho
Ki tusi usa nu akara (inasana bana'unde ho) dide ho jam asim
Asim tuhade vica mauta niyata kiti hai ate asim_usa tom ajiza (majabura) nahim
Ki tuhadi jag'ha te tuhade varage paida kara dite jana ate tuhanu ajihe rupa vica bana dita jave, jisa nu tusim janade nahim
Ate tusim pahile janama nu janade ho?Phira sikhi'a ki'um nahim lainde
ki tusim usa ciza te vicara kita jihari tusim bijade ho
Ki tusi usa nu uga'unde ho jam asim uga'una vale ham
Jekara asim cahi'e tam usa nu zura-jura kara de'i'e, phira tusim galam karade rahi ja'u
Ki asim tam ghate vica cale ga'e
Sagom asim purana taura te ujara ga'e
Ki tusim vicara kita usa pani te jihara tusim pinde ho
Ki usa nu badalam vicom tusim utari'a hai
Jam asim utarana vale ham. Jekara asim cahi'e tam usa nu behada khara kara de'i'e. Phira tusim sukara ki'um nahim karade
ki tusim usa aga te vicara kita jisa nu tusim balade ho
Ki usa de rukha nu tusim' paida kita hai jam asim' paida karana vale ham
Asim usa nu yada karana la'i bana'i'a hai ate rahi'am pandhi'am de varatana la'i
So tusim apane mahana raba di sifata salaha karo
Tam nahim maim tari'am di'am mazalam di sahu khanda ham
Ate jekara tusim vicara karom tam iha bahuta vadi sahu hai
